name: incongruently
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not suitable or does not fit well with something else: The ultra-modern spa stands rather incongruently in the middle of a row of residential terraced houses. His character, a stylish hipster, wanders incongruently through a building site.
More examplesFewer examplesThe statue seems awkwardly and incongruently placed.The table setting represents a typical family domestic scene, except that it sits incongruently in the boys’ dormitory.This modern Mexican restaurant is somewhat incongruently located on a stretch of road otherwise dominated by industrial work spaces.
